Craft file here: [(Un)stackable.craft](http://62.195.185.218/%28Un%29stackable.craft)

Cubic Octagonal Struts attached to the bottom of most things like those engines too...

![uQkyRfk.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/uQkyRfk.jpg)
The cubic octagonal strut will also work, but you have a weaker joint and it can be tricky to align them exactly in the middle.

Instead of the cubic strut, just use the flat radial connector thingie. Can withstand the force of the biggest engine.

Centering: go radial and choose 3. Align them so they look as one. Use angle snap so it will mount straight. Back to single, mount. Done.
